title: Report: US ETFs Signal Renewed Bitcoin Interest; BTC’s Limited ‘Hot Supply’ Eyes Bull Market
description: As interest in bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) heats up, a new report from blockchain analytics firm Glassnode examines how much bitcoin is actually available for purchase. The report, titled “How Many Bitcoin Are For Sale?” published on June 26, 2023, looks at exchange flows and onchain metrics to gauge bitcoin demand and supply dynamics. Bitcoin […]

title: Major U.S. banks lose $262 billion in deposits; Heartland Tri-State Bank collapses
description: The U.S. banking industry is experiencing a significant transformation as major banks lose customer deposits while smaller regional banks gain traction. The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) recently announced the failure of Heartland Tri-State Bank of Elkhart, Kansas, on July 28, with all customer deposits transferred to Dream First Bank, National Association (N.A.), also based ...
